alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 04 at 4:33AM AKDT until June 05 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON AKDT TODAY THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR CENTRAL INTERIOR... * AFFECTED AREA...North and east of Tanana. * TIMING...Noon to 10 pm Saturday and again Sunday during the afternoon and into the evening hours. * WINDS...Northeast 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...65 to 75. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that weather conditions could lead to the potential for a Red Flag event in the near future. This watch will remain in effect until it is upgraded to a Red Flag Warning or that it is determined that the Red Flag event will not develop. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
